tool_description: Gives data on Zodiac signs, their personality traits and dates
name: Zodiac Sign API
title: Zodiac Sign API

api_list.name: Getallsign
api_list.description: Get all sign. This returns all the available signs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zodiac-sign-api1.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zodiac-sign-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://zodiac-sign-api1.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zodiac-sign-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: SearchZodiacbySign
api_list.description: Search Zodiac by sign. This returns the value of the selected sign

required_parameters.name: sign
required_parameters.description: Ensure the first letter of the value is in capital letter
